text: Pierre Bazzo (born 17 January 1954) is a former French racing cyclist. He rode in nine editions of the Tour de France between 1977 and 1985. Bazzo tested positive for the anabolic steroid nandrolone after the 7th stage of the 1983 Tour de France.Incidents-Bazzo positive 08/07/1983 Positive test #437, dopeology.org ==Major results== ;1976 : 1st Stage 8 Tour de l'Avenir ;1977 : 6th Overall Circuit Cycliste Sarthe ;1978 : 1st Stage 3 Tour du Vaucluse : 2nd Grand Prix de Plumelec-Morbihan ;1979 : 1st Grand Prix de Mauléon-Moulins : 2nd Overall Tour du Limousin : 6th Overall Critérium International : 6th Overall Etoile de Bessèges : 9th GP Ouest France-Plouay ;1980 : 1st Stage 4 Paris–Nice : 5th Liège–Bastogne–Liège : 5th GP Ouest France-Plouay : 5th Overall Critérium International : 9th Overall Tour de France ;1981 : 4th Overall Paris–Nice : 7th GP Ouest France-Plouay ;1982 : 1st Grand Prix de Mauléon-Moulins : 6th Overall Tour du Limousin : 6th GP de la Ville de Rennes ;1983 : 1st Tour de Vendée : 1st GP Ouest France-Plouay : 2nd Overall Tour du Limousin ;1984 : 1st Grand Prix de Plumelec-Morbihan : 2nd GP de Fourmies : 2nd Grand Prix de Cannes : 6th Overall Four Days of Dunkirk ;1985 : 3rd Overall Critérium du Dauphiné Libéré ::1st Stage 5 ==References== ==External links== * Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Doping cases in cycling Category:French sportspeople in doping cases Category:French male cyclists Category:People from Bourg, Gironde Category:Tour de France cyclists Category:Sportspeople from Gironde Category:Vuelta a España cyclists
title: Pierre Bazzo
